example.code: PS C:\> $tag = New-Object Amazon.CodeDeploy.Model.Tag PS C:\> $tag.Key = "Name" PS C:\> $tag.Value = "CodeDeploy-OnPrem" PS C:\> Remove-CDOnPremiseInstanceTag -InstanceName AssetTag12010298EX -Tag $tag
example.description: This example deletes the specified tag for the on-premises instance with the specified name. The command will prompt for confirmation before proceeding. Add the â€“Force parameter to delete the tag without a prompt.
